numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are several major sports leagues.
2. In every major sports league, the maximum percentage of coaches of color does not exceed 41%.
3. The NBA has a high percentage of players of color.
4. The WNBA has a high percentage of players of color.
5. The MLS has the highest percentage of head coaches of color.
6. The NFL has the lowest percentage of head coaches of color.
7. The MLB has the lowest diversity.
8. The NBA has the highest diversity.
9. I wonder why the MLB has the lowest diversity.
10. In every major sports league, the percentage of players of color is greater than the percentage of coaches of color.
11. I wonder why the percentage of players of color is greater than the percentage of coaches of color in every major sports league.
12. This graph might help me determine a major sports league.
13. This graph might help me determine in which major sports league people of color are more likely to get in.
14. This graph can influence which sports young aspiring athletes direct their attention to.
15. This graph shows that leadership positions are preferred to be filled by people of non-color.
16. The title is: Racial inequality in major sports league.
